title: Eastern Europe Shock Therapy Network (1989-1999)
description: Document the export of Chilean shock therapy model to former Soviet states through Powell Memo institutional infrastructure
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 2: The Accelerant.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of disaster capitalism documentation. Focus on concrete timeline events, personnel connections, and institutional capture mechanisms.
research_areas: Jeffrey Sachs transition from Bolivia to Soviet states advisory roles
Heritage Foundation opening Eastern European offices
American Enterprise Institute fellowship programs for Eastern European economists
Western consultant firms facilitating oligarch wealth transfers
Corporate creation of extreme inequality while claiming democratic transformation
